activities: Metabolon, Inc. (“Metabolon”) provides biochemical analysis, research, diagnostics, consulting, and clinical trial support services.  In the course of providing its services, Metabolon may receive volunteered personal information ("PI) from individuals residing in the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland.  Metabolon may also receive PI from individuals who request information about Metabolon’s services.  PI may be collected online over the internet or from offline sources.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line, off-line, manually processed data, such as de-identified sample code, biochemical outputs, date, time and typical personal information; All data protected by internal privacy policy.
recoursemech: Metabolon will investigate and attempt to resolve complaints and disputes regarding use and disclosure of personal information in accordance with the principles contained in this Policy.  Disputes that cannot be resolved after good faith discussions will be referred to the American Arbitration Association ("AAA") for resolution (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor program)
